surveyproformat_label.content:
ATTACHMENT

This plugin, like all the others provided by surveypro core, is equipped with a set of common settings shared with all the other surveypro elements.

The common settings set is done by:

  1. Required
  2. Indent
  3. Question position
  4. Element number
  5. Hide filling instruction
  6. Variable
  7. Additional note

This plugin is equipped with only one file upload specific setting:

  1. Maximum files
  2. Maximum file size
  3. Allowed file types

The cartesian product of all these settings makes a very long list of possible implementations of this element. In this usertemplate few use cases are described.

Attachment plugin is equipped with three specific settings.
  1. max upload size;
  2. max number of uploadable files
  3. list of allowed extensions.

The cartesian product of these three options makes a very long list of possible implementation of this element. In this usertemplate I added few use cases of this plugin.

surveyprofield_fileupload.content: Please, upload the menu of the next week using a specific file per each working day.
